## Introductie

## Fixed-Effect Model

```{r}
# Defineer assumpties
theta <- 0.2
K <- 10
n1 <- 25
n2 <- 25

# Calculeer gepoolde effect standaard fout
sigma <- sqrt(((n1+n2)/(n1*n2)+(theta^2/(2*n1+n2)))/K)

# Calculeer z
z = theta/sigma

# Calculeer de power
1 - pnorm(1.96-z) + pnorm(-1.96-z)
```

```{r}
library(dmetar)
power.analysis(d = 0.2, 
               k = 10, 
               n1 = 25, 
               n2 = 25, 
               p = 0.05)
```

## Random-Effects Model

```{r}
power.analysis(d = 0.2, 
               k = 10, 
               n1 = 25, 
               n2 = 25, 
               p = 0.05,
               heterogeneity = "moderate")
```
